revision.text: ==English== ===Phrase=== {{en-phrase}} # {{lb|en|Internet slang}} {{initialism of|en|you have been [[troll]]ed|nodot=1}}: a response to someone who is "feeding a troll" (by entertaining the troll's absurd premise). ====Usage notes==== * Commonly seen as part of the expression "YHBT. YHL. [[HAND]]." - "You have been trolled. You have lost. Have a nice day." [http://www.catb.org/jargon/html/Y/YHBT.html] ====Synonyms==== * {{l|en|YHJBT}}
